column4: guys how to setup contab to start someone on reboot .. lets say i want to perform " screen -d -m rtorrent " on reboot .. how would i do it
will something like @rboot screen -d -m rtorrent .. work?
crontab executes commands regularly and isn't the right place for that
did you try to google? this comes up as the first hit and looks pretty good. http://rpatterson.net/blog/screen-sessions-at-boot
